title: Intensive Arabic Language Short Course Utilizing Mobile-Based Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Process conducted in a smartphone-centric limited technological environment, evaluating learners' communication skills and self-management competencies through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Acquisition of basic conversational skills using everyday Arabic expressions
Understanding cultural contexts through collaborative learning activities using Web 2.0 tools
Completion of real-life projects utilizing Arabic vocabulary acquired through mobile microlearning

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
